name: lightweight-localstorage
description: lightweight-localstorage is a lightweight utility for managing local storage in React and Next.js applications. It provides an easy-to-use API for setting, getting, and deleting items in local storage with support for a parent key to namespace the stored data.

scripts.mypush: export VERSION=$(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version") && git add . && git commit -m 'Bump version to $VERSION' && git tag v$VERSION && git push origin main && npm publish --access public
